sourcesContent:
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { addItem, clearCart, decereaseCart, removeItem } from "./Redux/Slices/cartSlice"; function Cart() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const cart = useSelector((store) => store.cart) dispatch() const handleRemoveItem= (cartItem) =>{ dispatch(removeItem(cartItem)) } const handleDecreseQty = (cartItem) =>{ dispatch(decereaseCart(cartItem)) } const handleIncreseQty = (cartItem) =>{ dispatch(addItem(cartItem)) } const handleClearCart = () => { dispatch(clearCart()) } return (

Shopping Cart

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your Cart Is Empty

): (

PRODUCT

PRICE

QUANTITY

Total

{cart.cartItems?.map((item)=>{ return (

{item.title}({item.brand})

₹{item.price}

handleDecreseQty(item)}>-

{item.cartQuantity}

handleIncreseQty(item)}>+

₹{item.price * item.cartQuantity}

) })}

SubTotal:

₹

Continue Shopping

)}
); } export default Cart;
